job_details.Functieomschrijving: Team  ServiceNow Research does both fundamental and applied research to futureproof AI-powered experiences. We are a group of researchers, applied scientists, and developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies that unlock new work experiences in the future. Our Large Language Model (LLM) lab aims to advance the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models. The lab takes the lead in open-science and open-governance initiatives, such as BigCode, in which it develops large language models from scratch, conducts cutting-edge research on them, and establishes responsible data governance practices.
job_details.full_text:
Staff Research Engineer

Team  ServiceNow Research does both fundamental and applied research to futureproof AI-powered experiences. We are a group of researchers, applied scientists, and developers who lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies that unlock new work experiences in the future. Our Large Language Model (LLM) lab aims to advance the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models. The lab takes the lead in open-science and open-governance initiatives, such as BigCode, in which it develops large language models from scratch, conducts cutting-edge research on them, and establishes responsible data governance practices.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes research and development of large language models (LLMs) from scratch, including conducting cutting-edge research on them and establishing responsible data governance practices. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and their responsible development, particularly within an LLM lab setting. The mention of 'advancing the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models' and 'develops large language models from scratch' strongly points to this profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'develops large language models from scratch' and 'conducts cutting-edge research on them,' which directly relates to the core process of creating and adapting machine learning models, specifically generative ones.
job_tasks.phrase: develops large language models from scratch

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies' indicates a focus on the modeling aspect of AI, including experimentation and evaluation.
job_tasks.phrase: research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'advancing the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models' points to the core task of working with and improving AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: advancing the responsible development of general-purpose AI models, particularly Large Language Models

job_tasks.justification: The description states the team 'lay the foundations... that unlock new work experiences in the future,' implying the development of systems or applications that utilize AI technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: lay the foundations... that unlock new work experiences in the future

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'establishes responsible data governance practices' and the involvement in 'open-science and open-governance initiatives' suggests a focus on the operational and ethical aspects of managing AI models and data.
The team's goal is to 'futureproof AI-powered experiences,' indicating an understanding of business needs and how AI can be applied to create future work experiences.

soft_skills.phrase: research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies
responsible development of general-purpose AI models
lay the foundations, research, experiment, and de-risk AI technologies
